addrTypeSelection.legacy-text:
Legacy address starting with a 1,
 allowed characters: 1-9, a-z, A-Z, not allowed characters: 0, O, l, I
 up to eight characters
 Higher transaction fees
addrTypeSelection.nested-segwit-text:
Nested SegWit allowed first characters: 2-9, A-Q from second character: 0-9, a-z, A-Z, not allowed characters: 0, O, l, I
 up to eight characters
 Medium transaction fees
addrTypeSelection.native-segwit-text:
Native SegWit Bech32 address
 starts with bc1q.
 Allowed characters: 0, 2-9, a-z, not allowed characters: 1, b, i, o
 up to ten characters
 Lower transaction fees

prefix.title: 2. Select the prefix
prefix.subtitle:
What characters should be included in the address?
 (Input without address type)
prefix.disallowed-prefix: Disallowed character detected in address prefix

pubkey.title: 3. Enter the public key
pubkey.text: Uncompressed and compressed public keys accepted

contact.title: 4. Enter Email or LNURL
contact.text: For recieving the Vanity Address and the Partial Private Key
